author: KIT-CMS
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is a backport and is required together with #47404 to produce tau embedding samples with 2022 data on official CMS resources. This backport is needed, as this CMSSW version contains the HLT menu: `HLT:2022v*`.
The tau embedding method is used to estimate the genuine di-tau background from data. It is a common method used in analyses with tau leptons. More information about tau embedding can be found in the paper: [https://doi.org/10.1088/1748-0221/14/06/P06032](https://doi.org/10.1088/1748-0221/14/06/P06032)  
In principle, one can split the method into 4 steps, but technically there are at least 6 steps that have to be executed.

To produce tau embedding samples, one can use the cmsDriver commands shown in this [presentation](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1508508/contributions/6347811/attachments/3007650/5301994/Christian_Winter_status_on_tau_embedding_2025_02_03.pdf#page=27).

The PR contains the following changes/commits:
1. f5d37ee83a110f3fadf9c2abac3fafe0b90f5aa8 : copied folder [`TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools`](https://github.com/KIT-CMS/cmssw/tree/master/TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools) from master branch. In particular, this contains the following PRs:
	1. #43871
	2. #47299
2. be2be8f9122fb1690537a38d565095e2c134c3c9 : contains changes introduced in PR #44884 which was to correct the correct place for GsfTrack dicts introduced in #43871
3. a26d847cce7cfac86c2743461a5b2d245bb1ec87 : Bug fix introduced in PR #42108
4. 82ed906ad673780c3d0764029c7d9d19639945e5 : Bug fix introduced in PR #42690
The last two Bug fix PR are also presented in detail in Artur's [presentation](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1301309/contributions/5472033/attachments/2677382/4643762/Embedding_Fixing_Setup_for_Run3.pdf).

The tau embedding method and these PRs will also be presented in a [PPD](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1510579/#5-tau-pog-tau-embedding-method) and [RECO](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1517184/#6-tau-embedding-method-update) meeting.
With this PR we target a new release.
title: Backport to produce 2022 Tau Embedding samples (HLT step)
